issue.title: Translations review
issue.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

A translation's files review is requested to fix some defects:
- missing translations entries
- french entries in the english files

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

* Fixed all "french in english" that I found (rev. 9301)
* Missing translations in other languages (FR + DE) are now managed in crowdin, and not on easySDI forge
